articles.content: The Washington Capitals have a "fairly high" concern regarding forward T.J. Oshie, who sustained a noncontact injury midway through the third period of a 5-3 win against the Tampa Bay Lightning on Th… [+612 chars]

articles.author: SportsDay Staff
articles.title: New Mavericks majority owner Miriam Adelson attends first game since purchase of franchise - The Dallas Morning News
articles.description: Adelson sat courtside for the Mavs’ matchup vs. Phoenix with son-in-law and Mavericks governor Patrick Dumont
articles.content:
The new-look Mavericks ownership group was on hand for Dallas star-studded win over Kevin Durant, Devin Booker and the Phoenix Suns on Thursday night.
